<right> <span style="font-size:22px"><a href="https://osf.io/preprints/socarxiv/usghb" target="_blank">**The Economic Effects of Climate Change in<br>Dynamic Spatial Equilibrium**</a></font>
<br /> (joint with Ivan Rudik, Gary Lyn, Ariel Ortiz-Bobea)   
<br /> <span style="font-size:18px"> <em>**R&R, Journal of Political Economy: Macroeconomics**</em>  
<br /> **Research Question**: What are the welfare effects of general equilibrium adaptation via trade, migration, and capital accumulation in response to <br> climate change?  
<br /> **Methodological Contributions**:<br /> 
(1) Model-consistent estimating equations to identify climate impacts on productivity and amenities from temperature shocks; <br />
(2) Quantitative decomposition of general equilibrium adaptation channels (trade, migration, industry switching, capital accumulation) to shocks in fundamentals in a dynamic spatial model
</right>
